connector.description: Receive data from a RabbitMQ Broker.

camel.kamelet.spring-rabbitmq-source.rou.name: camel.kamelet.spring-rabbitmq-source.routingKey
camel.kamelet.spring-rabbitmq-source.rou.description: The routing key to use when binding a consumer queue to the exchange

camel.kamelet.spring-rabbitmq-source.use.name: camel.kamelet.spring-rabbitmq-source.username
camel.kamelet.spring-rabbitmq-source.use.description: The username to access the RabbitMQ server

camel.kamelet.spring-rabbitmq-source.pas.name: camel.kamelet.spring-rabbitmq-source.password
camel.kamelet.spring-rabbitmq-source.pas.description: The password to access the RabbitMQ server

camel.kamelet.spring-rabbitmq-source.exc.name: camel.kamelet.spring-rabbitmq-source.exchangeName
camel.kamelet.spring-rabbitmq-source.exc.description: The exchange name determines the exchange the queue will be bound to

camel.kamelet.spring-rabbitmq-source.que.name: camel.kamelet.spring-rabbitmq-source.queues
camel.kamelet.spring-rabbitmq-source.que.description: The queue to receive messages from

camel.kamelet.spring-rabbitmq-source.aut.name: camel.kamelet.spring-rabbitmq-source.autoDeclare
camel.kamelet.spring-rabbitmq-source.aut.description: The routing key to use when binding a consumer queue to the exchange
